root.name: NHL Hitz 20-03
root.description: NHL Hitz 20-03 was the second game in the series, and featured arcade style 3on3 hockey, and was licensed by the NHL and NHLPA. Aside from the typical game modes featured in hockey games, NHL Hitz 20-03 also featured a number of mini games. Chris Pronger was the cover athlete, despite also appearing on EA's NHL 2000 release.
